root.name: Kamen Rider Black: Taiketsu Shadow Moon
root.description: OverviewKamen Rider Black: Taiketsu Shadow Moon ("Shadow Moon Showdown") is a licensed game based on the Kamen Rider tokusatsu franchise and specifically the TV show Kamen Rider Black, which had begun airing not too long before this game was released.The goal of the game is to defeat the mutants of the Gorgom cult and eventually Shadow Moon - the brainwashed twin of the main character Kamen Rider Black - all in one-on-one boss battles. Though most of the game has Kamen Rider Black on foot, there are sequences where he must ride a motorcycle over obstacles before reaching the next boss battle.
